sentences.sentence: It can be so relaxed and calm unexpectedly to face and become feeble and die repentantly.
sentences.translation: 面向衰亡可以是如此轻松而平静无悔。

sentences.sentence: Once the several times brilliant life in the rain in spring breeze summer , it can be so relaxed and calm unexpectedly to face and become feeble and die repentantly , laughed Death off!
sentences.translation: 曾经在春风夏雨里数度辉煌的生命，竟会如此轻松而平静无悔地面向衰亡，笑傲死神！
